fields.headline: On the rocks
fields.bodyText: Taking ice with a slice to the extreme, the Piano Bar at the Sheraton Park Tower hotel in London's Knightsbridge has launched the capital's most exclusive drink: the Louis XIII Diamond Cocktail. Containing a real diamond and mixed with champagne and Rémy Martin Louis XIII cognac, prices, even during happy hour, range from £1,000 to £4,000. Call 020 7235 8050.
